name: passwords-sqnfa-web
author: Martin Storgaard Dieu <martin@storgaarddieu.com>
description: Passwords are sine qua non for applications - also the for the web. This package aims to preprocess passwords in the browser before they are sent to the backend. It is not a substitute for proper handling of passwords in the backend. This is just an extra layer.

scripts.pretest: npm run fix && npm run compile
